headline: Citi Maintains Sell Rating on Enphase (ENPH), Lowers Price Target to $43
summary: On June 5, analysts at Citi reiterated a ‘Sell’ rating on Enphase Energy, Inc. (NASDAQ:ENPH) but cut their price target to $43 from $47. The price adjustments follow mounting concerns about the future of the US residential solar market. The analysts have raised concerns that the leading supplier of home energy solutions could come under […]
